channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Canada’s two major freight railroads may stop Thursday if contract dispute isn’t resolved
item.description: Canada’s two major freight railroads could come to a halt Thursday if they can’t resolve a contract dispute.

item.title: Human bones found near carousel in waterfront park in Brooklyn
item.description: New York City authorities are investigating after human bones were discovered near a waterfront carousel twice this week.

item.title: 23 indicted in alleged schemes to smuggle drugs, phones into Georgia prisons with drones
item.description: Federal prosecutors in Georgia have indicted 23 people in what authorities say were schemes to smuggle drugs and cellphones into prisons using drones. U.S.
